name: Vora AI
headline: AI agents for hiring teams
description:
Vora is building AI digital workers for hiring teams. We enable companies to cut time-to-hire for the top candidates by 50%.

Rachel - our AI recruiter - sources candidates, screens inbound applications (with resume and voice screens) and shortlists the top candidates so hiring teams can focus on closing the best talent faster.

founders.name: Pushkar Lanka, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CEO at Vora AI. Previously was an Engineering Manager at Plaid, where I led engineering for the Privacy and Risk teams. Before that, I was an early engineer on Meta's blockchain team (Novi).

# 
AI Digital Workers for Hiring Teams
Our AI recruiter Rachel screens your inbound applications, shortlists candidates and conducts phone screens so you can focus on closing the top candidates
[Talk to Rachel](https://www.usevora.ai/<https:/www.vorai.co/demo>)[Book a demo](https://www.usevora.ai/<https:/calendly.com/pushkar-lanka/30min>)

[Hire Rachel Today](https://www.usevora.ai/<https:/calendly.com/pushkar-lanka/30min>)
### AI-Powered Application Review
Rachel screens and ranks inbound applications instantly using criteria you define. Get clear recommendations on who to advance.
### AI-Powered Phone Screens
Rachel conducts phone screens and asks thoughtful and personalized questions, so you only spend time on the best candidates.
### Instant Slack & Email Updates
Rachel sends shortlisted candidates straight to you, just like a proactive recruiter. No dashboards, no delays.

generated_description:
**Vora AI: Revolutionizing Hiring with AI**

Vora AI is a fresh startup founded in 2024, sitting snugly within the bustling tech ecosystem of San Francisco and part of Y Combinator's Batch W25. Their mission is straightforward but impactful: to streamline the hiring process for teams using advanced AI agents.

The star of their offerings is Rachel, an AI recruiter designed to improve efficiency in hiring. Rachel does the heavy lifting by sourcing candidates, screening resumes, and even conducting initial phone interviews. The result? Companies can reduce their time-to-hire for top candidates by a staggering 50%. This allows hiring teams to shift their focus from sifting through applications to engaging directly with the best talent.

One of the key features of Rachel is her ability to assess inbound applications against criteria defined by the hiring team. She not only ranks candidates but also delivers instant updates via Slack and email, mimicking the responsiveness of a proactive recruiter. 

Vora AI is tagged under several categories including generative AI, B2B, HR tech, and is firmly placed within the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area.

Despite its small team—currently just one employee—Vora AI is making big waves in the recruitment landscape. With Michael Seibel from Y Combinator acting as their Group Partner, they're on a concrete path toward growth and innovation in the hiring space.

If you're a team looking to enhance your recruitment process, you can connect with Rachel and explore what Vora AI has to offer by visiting their website [here](https://www.usevora.ai/). 

In a world where hiring can often be a bottleneck, Vora AI is bringing a much-needed breath of fresh air—efficient, effective, and endlessly adaptable.
